Location:
- Outdoor condenser cabinet (AC unit) side of the house.

Observations:
- Safety/operating label on panel; label shows minor cracking but is legible.
- Small rust spots along lower/right edge of the cabinet.
- No visible dents, water stains, or exposed wiring.

Potential Issues:
- Beginning corrosion on cabinet surface (rust spots).
- Cracked/aging label may affect long-term readability of warnings.

Recommendations:
- Treat and repaint rust spots; monitor for spreading corrosion.
- Have HVAC tech inspect cabinet/frame for integrity and verify electrical disconnect/accessory fasteners are secure.
- Ensure adequate clearance around the unit for airflow and service access; inspect for any hidden leaks around refrigerant lines.
